header.description: Report header scalars: the user-supplied date range and the runtime generation timestamp.

rows.description: One row per device table record in app_device_tables, filtered by last_migrated_at within the selected date range.

totals.description: No totals section in this report.

semantics: date_from and date_to are required user-supplied parameters that filter rows by app_device_tables.last_migrated_at. generated_at is a runtime constant provided by the report engine at generation time and is not stored in the database.
transformations: No reshape needed â€” all row data comes from a single flat table (app_device_tables).
Format row_last_migrated_at as a readable datetime string (dd-mm-yyyy HH:MM:SS).
Filter rows where app_device_tables.last_migrated_at is between PARAM:date_from and PARAM:date_to.
